member.name: T:FacebookGraphAPIHelper.BaseResponse
member.summary: The response object to return the result of request to GraphAPI.

member.summary: Indicates whether the response succed or not.

member.name: F:FacebookGraphAPIHelper.BaseResponse.responseData
member.summary: Response data in JSON format.

member.summary: Default constructor, returns new instance of BaseResponse. Sets success field to true.

member.name: P:FacebookGraphAPIHelper.BaseResponse.Exception
member.summary: Gets or sets response Exception. Sets success to false with set action.

member.name: M:FacebookGraphAPIHelper.GraphAPIHelper.GetLongLivedAccessToken(System.String,System.String@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Obtains long-lived user access token (expires in about 60 days).
member.param: Out parameter to return generated long-lived token.
Indicates the need to replace the token. If true the accessToken field of current GraphAPIHelper will be replaced. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:FacebookGraphAPIHelper.GraphAPIHelper.GetUserAccounts(FacebookGraphAPIHelper.Objects.FBPages@)
member.summary: Obtains FB Pages admined by current User(by current UserAccessToken).

member.name: M:FacebookGraphAPIHelper.GraphAPIHelper.FindUserAccount(System.String,System.String,FacebookGraphAPIHelper.Objects.FBPages)
member.summary: Searches in Accounts object for Account by Account.name filed. Returns Account instance.
member.returns: Returns first Account where Account.name = name.

member.name: M:FacebookGraphAPIHelper.GraphAPIHelper.GetPageByUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Searches for a Page by its Url string via GraphAPI.

member.name: M:FacebookGraphAPIHelper.GraphAPIHelper.GetPagePicture(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Requests for page picture.
member.param: The size of this picture. It can be one of the following values: small, normal, large, square.
member.returns: FBPagePicture instance wich includes picture url. Use LoadPictureFromUrl method to load picture.

member.name: M:FacebookGraphAPIHelper.GraphAPIHelper.LoadPictureFromUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Loads picture from Uri as byte[]

member.name: M:FacebookGraphAPIHelper.GraphAPIHelper.GetTopPosts(System.String,System.String,FacebookGraphAPIHelper.Objects.Posts@,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Requests GraphAPI for top posts of the Page or posts tagged this Page dependent on "nodePath" parameter./>.
member.param: AccessToken that will be used in graphApi request. For Page specific calls pass PageAccessToken as argument. Pass null as argument to use default user token. Default token - UserAccessToken.
Out parameter to receive the data.
List of fields to include into request.

members.member:
Requests GraphAPI for all posts of the Page.
Id of the Page. /// AccessToken that will be used in graphApi request. For Page specific calls pass PageAccessToken as argument. Pass null as argument to use default user token. Default token - UserAccessToken.
Out parameter to receive the data. List of fields to include into request. Graph API node path: /tagged or /posts Instance of BaseResponse class.
